trans-unit.source: Adds a <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Table.TableOperation</codeEntityReference> to the <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Table.TableBatchOperation</codeEntityReference> that retrieves an entity with the specified partition key and row key.
trans-unit.target: Adds a <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Table.TableOperation</codeEntityReference> to the <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Table.TableBatchOperation</codeEntityReference> that retrieves an entity with the specified partition key and row key.

trans-unit.source: A string containing the partition key of the entity to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: A string containing the partition key of the entity to retrieve.

trans-unit.source: A string containing the row key of the entity to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: A string containing the row key of the entity to retrieve.

trans-unit.source: Inserts a <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Table.TableOperation</codeEntityReference> into the batch that retrieves an entity based on its row key and partition key.
trans-unit.target: Inserts a <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Table.TableOperation</codeEntityReference> into the batch that retrieves an entity based on its row key and partition key.

trans-unit.source: The entity will be deserialized into the specified class type which extends <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Table.ITableEntity</codeEntityReference>.
trans-unit.target: The entity will be deserialized into the specified class type which extends <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Table.ITableEntity</codeEntityReference>.

trans-unit.source: The class of type for the entity to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: The class of type for the entity to retrieve.

trans-unit.source: A string containing the partition key of the entity to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: A string containing the partition key of the entity to retrieve.

trans-unit.source: A string containing the row key of the entity to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: A string containing the row key of the entity to retrieve.

trans-unit.source: Adds a table operation to retrieve an entity of the specified class type with the specified partition key and row key to the batch operation.
trans-unit.target: Adds a table operation to retrieve an entity of the specified class type with the specified partition key and row key to the batch operation.

trans-unit.source: The return type which the specified <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Table.EntityResolver`1</codeEntityReference> will resolve the given entity to.
trans-unit.target: The return type which the specified <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Table.EntityResolver`1</codeEntityReference> will resolve the given entity to.

trans-unit.source: A string containing the partition key of the entity to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: A string containing the partition key of the entity to retrieve.

trans-unit.source: A string containing the row key of the entity to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: A string containing the row key of the entity to retrieve.

trans-unit.source: The <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Table.EntityResolver`1</codeEntityReference> implementation to project the entity to retrieve as a particular type in the result.
trans-unit.target: The <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Table.EntityResolver`1</codeEntityReference> implementation to project the entity to retrieve as a particular type in the result.
